channel.title: Daniel Lemire on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Daniel Lemire on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: Why speed matters
item.description:
If everything is slow-moving around you, it is likely not going to be good. To fully make use of your brain, you need to move as close as possible to the speed of your thought.

– Daniel Lemire, Why Speed Matters.
